name: Bit Boy!!
overview: Get ready for the most spectacular journey through time in the history of videogames!! Accompany Bit Boy Kubi through a crazy pixellated adventure and battle hordes of nasty monsters in: 4-bit dungeons, 8-bit caves, 16-bit strongholds, 32-bit labyrinths, 64-bit arenas and 128-bit worlds!! Rescue Kubi's friends!! Set off in the ultimate pursuit of fruits and highscores!! Grab a friend for even more fun in Cooperative mode!! The Wii Remote is your joystick - let the arcade adventure begin!!
